name: Nordia
description:
Nordia is the largest customer service provider in Canada and has been a leader in the telecommunications industry since 1999. Nordia operates 14 centers in 4 provinces (British Columbia, Ontario, Quebec and New Brunswick) and offers a wide range of support to help customers get the most out of their services and solve their problems.
These services include: customer support (billing, service, technical), sales and retention, directory assistance and teleconferencing service, and relay service to facilitate communications for customers who are hard of hearing or impaired slurred speech. Nordia is proud to attract and retain top talent by providing a stimulating and rewarding environment for its employees, as well as a global compensation of the most competitive of the industry. In a recent survey, 85% of employees would recommend Nordia as an employer to their families and friends. *** Nordia is Canada's largest provider of customer service solutions and has been an industry leader in the telecommunications sector since 1999.
